roleset.name: surround with land

role.descr: the land, what is surrounding arg1

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'surround'.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Did the geniuses notice they landlocked the Staten Island Ferry Terminal, as well as the Govs Island Terminal that houses the East River ferries?
example.arg: the Staten Island Ferry Terminal, as well as the Govs Island Terminal that houses the East River ferries

example.name: Another arg0
example.text: It would only jeopardize Iran infrastructure more and land lock them ..

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: [The harbour in Lance Cove]-1 is completely landlocked *-1 by debris.

example.name: Active with args 1, 2
example.text: Foothills of the Santa Cruz Mountains landlock the area surrounding Camp McQuaide.
example.arg: Footills of the Santa Cruz Mountains
